text: Ptychosyrinx is a genus of sea snails and marine gastropod mollusks in the family Turridae, the turrids. ==Species== Species within the genus Ptychosyrinx include: * Ptychosyrinx bisinuata (Martens, 1901) * Ptychosyrinx carynae (Haas, 1949) * Ptychosyrinx chilensis Berry, 1968 * Ptychosyrinx lobata (Sowerby III, 1903) * Ptychosyrinx nodulosus (Gmelin, 1791) ==References== * Cernohorsky, Walter O. "Taxonomic notes on some deep-water Turridae (Mollusca: Gastropoda) from the Malagasy Republic." Records of the Auckland Institute and Museum (1987): 123-134. ==External links== * Category:Turridae
title: Ptychosyrinx
